item.title: I Left My Friends Speechless!
item.description: A nostalgic story about a childhood dream car that became a reality, and how sharing its history left friends truly speechless.

item.description: An unfiltered yet thoughtful story about life on the road, and the surprising wisdom learned from behind the wheel of a limousine.

item.description: Reflections on classic cars and the characters who came with them — lessons learned from years of buying, selling, and storytelling.

item.description: A powerful reflection on how our biggest mistakes can become turning points, reminders to grow, change, and never stop moving forward.

item.description: Practical insights on how to connect with buyers, build trust, and close a deal the right way, lessons from years in the car business.

item.description: A personal memory about his father’s unusual gamble with water cars, and why they never quite won him over.

item.description: Rob “Rabbit” Pitts reflected on how greater success often brings unexpected pressures and responsibilities, sharing his perspective with honesty and gratitude.
